personalInfo.name: Jacob Benjamin
personalInfo.title: Technical Program Manager & Low-Code Expert
personalInfo.summary: Technical Program Manager & Low-Code Expert holding PMP, Active Secret Clearance, Appian Certified Lead Developer, and Security+. Combines strategic leadership of a $70M program with hands-on expertise in Appian, Salesforce, OneStream, Docusign, and Agile methodologies. Specialized in leading digital transformation efforts that modernized legacy DoD systems, resulting in an annual $142k labor cost reduction, a ~$2M profit increase, and significant NPS improvements.

experience.project: Army â€“ Resource Managers Workspace (RMW) & IRIT

caseStudyData.title: Project Recovery: Army RMW
caseStudyData.challenge: Inherited a $70M project with significant post-deployment issues, low user adoption, and looming budget cuts.
caseStudyData.strategy: Implemented strict Agile controls, transparent OCM protocols, and strategic OneStream deployment across 26 commands.
caseStudyData.outcome: NPS score improved from Detractor to Promoter. Identified legacy divestiture opportunities. Increased profitability by $2M via optimization.

details: Leads 20+ team executing $70M Army RMW/IRIT projects.
Strategic deployment of OneStream PPBE to 26 commands.
Rescued failing project; NPS from Detractor to Promoter.
Navigated budget reductions to minimize impact and increased profitability by +$2M.

caseStudyData.title: Digital Transformation: NDU Connect
caseStudyData.challenge: Manual paper processing (DD 2875 forms) causing massive delays and an 11% data entry error rate.
caseStudyData.strategy: Architected a Salesforce + Docusign automated workflow for account creation and academic support.
caseStudyData.outcome: 1,450 labor hours saved annually ($142k equivalent). 11% error reduction. 30% faster system load times.

details: Deputy PM & Scrum Master for NDU Connect.
Configured Salesforce/Docusign, saving $142k/yr.
Reduced system load times by ~30% for high-volume operations.
Improved Section 508 compliance.
Built joint enforcement case mgmt system for NOAA.
Dynamic XML PDF generation for 60+ docs.
Migrated DOL Trade Adjustment data.
Led Appian prototyping teams.
Integrated Google Cloud AI (Vision, NLP).
Database developer on 3 concurrent projects.
Designed BPM solutions for CMS.
Created UX prototypes.
Researched enterprise frameworks.
Lead presenter at 2024 Mentors Conference on adapting Agile Scrum.
Assisted with recruiting volunteers for competitions in VA, MD, and DC.
Facilitated cybersecurity education for students via games.
Mentored 15+ high school students in Agile and systems engineering.
Supported team in winning 2023 & 2024 Championships.

affiliations: Eagle Scout, Boy Scouts of America
Member, Alpha Phi Omega (National Service Fraternity)
Member, Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society

testimonials.text: Successfully executed $70M projects by continuously driving process improvements.
Decreased data entry errors by ~11% via full digitalization.
Rescued a failing project, increasing NPS from Detractor to Promoter.
